| HistoryText             = The [[A.I.vengers (Earth-616)|A.I.vengers]] were built by [[Henry Pym (Earth-616)|Dr. Hank Pym]] to give him positive affirmation while he was in the [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]]. One of Pym's enemies, [[Elihas Starr (Earth-616)|Egghead]] managed to get a hold of the A.I.vengers and hired [[Raz Malhotra (Earth-616)|Raz Malhotra]] to activate them for him. They were stopped by the combined efforts of Hank Pym (as Giant-Man), [[Scott Lang (Earth-616)|Ant-Man]], and Raz himself, when he broke from Egghead's control.{{r|Ant-Man Annual Vol 1 1}}

During [[Hydra (Earth-616)|Hydra]] and [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Hulk]]'s assault on [[Mount|The Mount]], Raz, now a member of the [[Underground (Secret Empire) (Earth-616)|Underground]] revealed that he had created his own A.I.vengers, who helped defend against the attack, but were ultimately defeated.{{r|Secret Empire Vol 1 6}}
